import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Person } from '../person'; import { PersonLsService } from '../person-ls.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'], }) export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit { personId?: number; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe((params) => { this.personId = params['id']; }); } }
